lambda.docs:
**[lambda](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-lambda)**: Lambda to be evaluated every update interval to get the new value of the sensor



*See also: [Template Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/template.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to publish the value of the sensor, either the result of the lambda function or if no lambda function the last value published using the publish action. Defaults to `60s`.



*See also: [Template Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/template.html#configuration-variables)*

CONFIG_SCHEMA.docs:
The `template` sensor platform allows you to create a sensor with templated values using [lambdas](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-lambda).

*See also: [Template Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/template.html#template-sensor)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the template sensor.



*See also: [Template Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/template.html#sensor-template-publish-action)*

publish.docs:
You can also publish a state to a template sensor from elsewhere in your YAML file with the `sensor.template.publish` action.

*See also: [Template Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/template.html#sensor-template-publish-action)*
